infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app may access location services to enhance your experience with location-based features.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app may access location services to enhance your experience with location-based features.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to capture photos and videos for your content.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app uses the microphone to record audio for your content.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photo library to save and manage your photos.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: This app may access your contacts to enhance your user experience.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: This app may access your calendar to help manage your schedule.
infoPlist.NSRemindersUsageDescription: This app may access your reminders to help you stay organized.
infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This app may track your activity to provide personalized experiences and improve our services.
